SITE_LIST_TOOLTIP_TEXT: Sites list: All the sites paired with this site. Use this tab to pair to other sites or unpair sites.
VM_LIST_TOOLTIP_TEXT: VM list: Details about the virtual machines that are either protected in VPGs in this site, or recovered to this site.
VPG_LIST_TOOLTIP_TEXT: VPG list: Details about the VPGs that are either protected in this site or recovered to this site.
SETUP_TOOLTIP_TEXT: Setup information: Tabs enabling you to set up and manage VRAs and offsite backup repositories and view datastore usage.
SETUP_PUBLIC_CLOUD_TOOLTIP_TEXT: Setup information: Set up and manage offsite backup repositories.
SETUP_HYPERV_TOOLTIP_TEXT: Setup information: Tabs enabling you to set up and manage VRAs and offsite backup repositories and view storage usage.
OFFSITE_BACKUP_TOOLTIP_TEXT: Offsite backup information: Details of the VPGs and protected virtual machines that have an offsite backup defined for them. You can also run an unscheduled backup or cancel a running backup.
MONITORING_TOOLTIP_TEXT: Monitoring information: Tabs listing alerts, events and tasks.
DASHBOARD_TOOLTIP: General protection and recovery details of both the protected and recovery sites
VPGS_TOOLTIP: Lists the VPGs from both the local and peer sites and provides summary details of each VPG
VMS_TOOLTIP: Lists the protected VMs from both the local and peer sites and provides summary details of each VM
SITES_TOOLTIP: Lists all the peer sites and provides summary details of each peer site
SETUP_TOOLTIP: Manage Virtual Replication Appliances (VRAs), Storage used for recovery and offsite backup repositories
OFFSITE_TOOLTIP: Lists the VPGs defined with offsite backups and provides summary details of the backups
REPORTS_TOOLTIP: Reports such as performance, usage and resource information
